name: Lemon-Herb Buttermilk Dressing
description: Packed with herbs and plenty of lemon, this quick buttermilk dressing can be considered a brighter, lighter cousin of ranch. It's terrific in grain bowls, for salads or even as a sauce for poached, sautéed or grilled fish.
keywords: basil, buttermilk, chives, lemon juice, sour cream, thyme
recipeIngredient: 4 teaspoons lemon juice, or to taste
2 tablespoons olive oil, or to taste
1 teaspoon finely minced thyme leaves (from about 5 sprigs)
1 1/2 tablespoons finely minced fresh basil (about 10 large leaves)

recipeInstructions.text: In a small bowl, whisk together the buttermilk and sour cream. Whisk in the lemon juice and olive oil, and season to taste with salt and plenty of black pepper. Stir in the thyme, basil and chives.
